mapper.insert: INSERT INTO publish_package (site_id, target, schedule, approval_state, package_state, submitter_id, submitter_comment, package_type, commit_id) VALUES (#{publishPackage.siteId}, #{publishPackage.target}, #{publishPackage.schedule}, #{publishPackage.approvalState}, #{readyState}, #{publishPackage.submitterId}, #{publishPackage.submitterComment}, #{publishPackage.packageType}, #{publishPackage.commitId});

INSERT INTO publish_item (package_id, path, live_previous_path, staging_previous_path, action, user_requested, publish_state) VALUES
(#{packageId}, #{item.path}, #{item.livePreviousPath}, #{item.stagingPreviousPath}, #{item.action}, #{item.userRequested}, #{publishState})

INSERT INTO item_publish_item SELECT pi.id, i.id FROM publish_package pp INNER JOIN publish_item pi ON pp.id = pi.package_id INNER JOIN item i ON pi.path = i.path AND i.site_id = pp.site_id WHERE pp.id = #{packageId}
mapper.update: UPDATE publish_package SET target = #{publishPackage.target}, schedule = #{publishPackage.schedule}, approval_state = #{publishPackage.approvalState}, package_state = #{publishPackage.packageState}, live_error = #{publishPackage.liveError}, staging_error = #{publishPackage.stagingError}, reviewer_id = #{publishPackage.reviewerId}, reviewer_comment = #{publishPackage.reviewerComment}, reviewed_on = #{publishPackage.reviewedOn}, published_on = #{publishPackage.publishedOn}, published_staging_commit_id = #{publishPackage.publishedStagingCommitId}, published_live_commit_id = #{publishPackage.publishedLiveCommitId} WHERE id = #{publishPackage.id}
mapper.sql: ( SELECT pp.site_id, ipi.item_id, pi.path FROM publish_package pp INNER JOIN publish_item pi ON pp.id = pi.package_id INNER JOIN item_publish_item ipi ON pi.id = ipi.publish_item_id WHERE pp.id = #{packageId} AND (pi.publish_state & #{itemSuccessState}) > 0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT pp.*, (select count(1) from publish_item where package_id = pp.id) as size FROM publish_package pp INNER JOIN site s ON pp.site_id = s.id INNER JOIN user sub ON pp.submitter_id = sub.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user rev ON pp.reviewer_id = rev.id
ORDER BY pp.published_on DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT count(1) FROM publish_package pp INNER JOIN site s ON pp.site_id = s.id INNER JOIN user sub ON pp.submitter_id = sub.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user rev ON pp.reviewer_id = rev.id
ORDER BY pp.published_on DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT path) FROM publish_item pi INNER JOIN publish_package pp ON pi.package_id = pp.id INNER JOIN site s ON pp.site_id = s.id WHERE s.site_id = #{siteId} AND pp.published_on >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL #{days} DAY)

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM publish_item pi INNER JOIN publish_package pp ON pi.package_id = pp.id INNER JOIN site s ON pp.site_id = s.id WHERE s.site_id = #{siteId} AND pp.published_on >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND pi.action = #{action} AND (pp.package_state & #{completedState}) > 0
